v2pc-perform-scan-vpc.Description: When a request message is published in SQS, this function is triggered by SQS. It performs the actual VPC scan (calling several AWS APIs) and stores the result scan data in S3 bucket.

Versions.Description: When a request message is published in SQS, this function is triggered by SQS. It performs the actual VPC scan (calling several AWS APIs) and stores the result scan data in S3 bucket.

Configuration.Description: When a request message is published in SQS, this function is triggered by SQS. It performs the actual VPC scan (calling several AWS APIs) and stores the result scan data in S3 bucket.

v2pc-build-initial-view-diagram-from-sca.Description: When a new scan result is stored in S3 bucket, this function is triggered. It builds and stores default view diagram in S3 bucket.

Versions.Description: When a new scan result is stored in S3 bucket, this function is triggered. It builds and stores default view diagram in S3 bucket.

Configuration.Description: When a new scan result is stored in S3 bucket, this function is triggered. It builds and stores default view diagram in S3 bucket.

v2pc-get-viewdata-last.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves the list and contents of the stored view data objects from S3 bucket.

Versions.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves the list and contents of the stored view data objects from S3 bucket.

Configuration.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves the list and contents of the stored view data objects from S3 bucket.

v2pc-build-and-update-viewdata-for-resou.Description: ResourceGroup에 대한 viewData를 생성/갱신 - Resource추가에 따른 갱신 기능 추가 필요

v2pc-request-scan.Description: Upon user requests, this function publish a scan request message into SQS fifo.

Versions.Description: Upon user requests, this function publish a scan request message into SQS fifo.

Configuration.Description: Upon user requests, this function publish a scan request message into SQS fifo.

v2pc-role-manage.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves and stores the role ARNs in a DynamoDB table.

Versions.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves and stores the role ARNs in a DynamoDB table.

Configuration.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves and stores the role ARNs in a DynamoDB table.

v2pc-store-viewdata-last.Description: Upon user requests, this function stores the modified view data onto S3 bucket.

Versions.Description: Upon user requests, this function stores the modified view data onto S3 bucket.

Configuration.Description: Upon user requests, this function stores the modified view data onto S3 bucket.

v2pc-manage-scanscope.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves and stores the scanscopes configuration for a user in a DynamoDB table.

Versions.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves and stores the scanscopes configuration for a user in a DynamoDB table.

Configuration.Description: Upon user requests, this function retrieves and stores the scanscopes configuration for a user in a DynamoDB table.

v2pc-add-user.Description: After the sign up process is confirmed, Cognito call this function to enroll user data to DynamoDB.

Versions.Description: After the sign up process is confirmed, Cognito call this function to enroll user data to DynamoDB.

v2pc-manage-resourcegroup-info.Description: Upon user request, 선택된 일부 resource들을 묶어놓는 ResourceGroup을 생성/조회/삭제하는 용도 - 수정기능 추가필요

Role.Description: Allows Lambda functions to call AWS services on your behalf.

arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AmazonDynamoDBRe.Description: Provides read only access to Amazon DynamoDB via the AWS Management Console.

arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWS.Description: Provides receive message, delete message, and read attribute access to SQS queues, and write permissions to CloudWatch logs.

arn:aws:iam::395824177941:policy/v2pc-rw.Description: DynamoDB item level read and write permission, especially for v2pc-config table.

arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AmazonS3ReadOnly.Description: Provides read only access to all buckets via the AWS Management Console.

arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AWSCodeDeployFul.Description: Provides full access to CodeDeploy resources.

arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWS.Description: Provides write permissions to CloudWatch Logs.

arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AmazonDynamoDBFu.Description: Provides full access to Amazon DynamoDB via the AWS Management Console.
